snippet: Perjeta, a Genentech drug already approved for late-stage breast cancer, could be used in patients before surgery to remove tumors if the F.D.A. approves it.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration advisory committee clears way for first approval of cancer drug that would be used to treat patients before surgery to remove tumors; Perjeta, developed by Genentech, had previously been approved only for treatment of late-stage breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: Perjeta, a Genentech drug already approved for late-stage breast cancer, could be used in patients before surgery to remove tumors if the F.D.A. approves it.

headline.main: F.D.A. Panel Backs Pre-Surgery Drug for Breast Cancer
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Panel Backs Pre-Surgery Drug for Breast Cancer
